publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3958 Alex Neil: No Confidence in Lord Advocate—That the Parliament has no confidence in the Lord Advocate in light of the Scottish Executive’s handling of the Shirley McKie case.
S2M-3958 No Confidence in Lord Advocate (lodged on 14 February 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3958 No Confidence in Lord Advocate (lodged on 14 February 2006) Mr Bruce McFee*
